info.title: TiTiler PgSTAC
info.description: A lightweight STAC API implementation using PostgreSQL as a backend.

get.description: Get Search query metadata.
List a Search query.

parameters.description: Sort the response items by a property (ascending (default) or descending).

schema.title: Sortby
schema.description: Sort the response items by a property (ascending (default) or descending).

parameters.name: sortby

get.description: Create map tile.

parameters.description: Buffer on each side of the given tile. It must be a multiple of `0.5`. Output **tilesize** will be expanded to `tilesize + 2 * buffer` (e.g 0.5 = 257x257, 1.0 = 258x258).

schema.title: Tile buffer.
schema.description: Buffer on each side of the given tile. It must be a multiple of `0.5`. Output **tilesize** will be expanded to `tilesize + 2 * buffer` (e.g 0.5 = 257x257, 1.0 = 258x258).

parameters.name: buffer
